short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Makes email "scary" in order to disrupt NSA surveillance

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ScareMail makes email "scary" in order to disrupt NSA surveillance. Extending Google's Gmail, the work adds to every new email's signature an algorithmically generated narrative containing a collection of probable NSA search terms. This "story" acts as a trap for NSA programs like PRISM and XKeyscore, forcing them to look at nonsense. Each email's story is unique in an attempt to avoid automated filtering by NSA search systems.
